mapper.select: SELECT info.*, pt.Detained_person_type_desc, at.appeal_type_desc, dps.Detained_person_status_desc, ac.appeal_channel_desc, ks.keep_status_desc, area.area_desc from t01_detained_person_info info left join t99_detained_person_type pt on info.Detained_person_type_cd = pt.Detained_person_type_cd left join t99_appeal_type at on info.appeal_channel_cd = at.appeal_type_cd left join t99_detained_person_status dps on dps.Detained_person_status_cd=info.Detained_person_status_cd left join t99_appeal_channel ac on ac.appeal_channel_cd=info.appeal_channel_cd left join t99_keep_status ks on ks.keep_status_cd=info.keep_status_cd left join t99_area area on area.area_cd=info.place_area_cd WHERE info.id=#{id}
